mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_address, member_phone, member_mail )VALUES( #{memberId}, PASSWORD(#{memberPw}), #{memberName}, #{memberAddr}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberMail} )
mapper.select: SELECT member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND member_pw = PASSWORD(#{memberPw})
SELECT member_id FROM (SELECT member_id FROM member UNION SELECT member_id FROM memberid )t WHERE member_id = #{checkMemberId}
SELECT member_id as memberId, member_name as memberName, member_address as memberAddr, member_phone as memberPhone, member_mail as memberMail FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_name = #{memberName}, member_address = #{memberAddr}, member_phone = #{memberPhone}, member_mail = #{memberMail} WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND member_pw = PASSWORD(#{memberPw})
